channel.title: Log in help
channel.description: I've currently got a log in problem, which I presume is connected to port forwarding being wrong, I can log into my server locally, but when I try to use the ip to connect to the server, it doesn't allow me to do so, all help is appreciated, thank you.

item.title: Log in help
item.dc:creator: @handofgod13 handofgod13
item.description:
@handofgod13 wrote:

That would be great, do you have an msn I could add you at, to make it more convenient?

Read full topic

item.title: Log in help
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

I can teamview with you and see if there’s anything wrong with your port forwarding.

Read full topic

item.title: Log in help
item.dc:creator: @handofgod13 handofgod13
item.description:
@handofgod13 wrote:

I’ve had several people try to log in, one said he thinks it’s no-ip failure, and another said it’s a portforward prob, no one has been able to get in but me on a local ip :(.

Read full topic

item.title: Log in help
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

I had the same problem, your port forwarding is most likely correct. I can only login to by localhost, I don’t think you can actually connect through your no-ip IP, only players that play your server can connect to your no-ip IP. You’ll only know for sure by having someone try to login to your server with the IP set your no-ip IP.

Read full topic
